title: The Gary Null Show
content:
A discussion of thyroid conditions in women with Dr. Raphael Kellman, pioneer in functional medicine.

Dr. <!--more--> Raphael Kellman, MD is an internal medical physician in private practice in mid-town Manhattan who has been practicing alternative and complementary medicine for almost 20 years.
  He was a founder of Mind-Body New York, one of the country’s most advanced integrative health centers, which offered pioneering and innovative treatments for many diseases  including cancer, heart disease, chronic fatigue syndrome and autoimmune conditions Dr Kellman integrates the best of scientifically proven therapeutic and prevention modalities from both conventional and natural health systems.
He is also a specialist in  thyroid related illnesses, autism, obesity, oncology and rebalancing the bodies microbiome to treat a wide variety of disorders.
Dr Kellman received his medical degree from Albert Einstein College of Medicine and is the author of several books, the most recent being “The Microbiome Diet: A Scientifically Proven Way to Restore your Gut Health” His website is RaphaelKellmanMD.com
